Module Homework_5
Package edu.mu.AbstractPizza

Class AbstractPizza

java.lang.Object
edu.mu.AbstractPizza.AbstractPizza
Direct Known Subclasses:
HawaiianPizza, MargheritaPizza, SupremePizza, VegetarianPizza
public abstract class AbstractPizza extends Object
Abstract class representing a pizza order. Provides methods and attributes common to all types of pizzas.

    • AbstractPizza

      public AbstractPizza(List<Toppings> toppingList, double priceWithoutToppings, double totalPrice, int pizzaOrderID, ICookingStrategy cookingStrategy, double cookingPrice)
      Constructor for AbstractPizza. Initializes the topping list, price without toppings, total price, pizza order ID, cooking strategy, and cooking price.
      Parameters:
      toppingList - The list of toppings on the pizza.
      priceWithoutToppings - The price of the pizza without toppings.
      totalPrice - The total price of the pizza.
      pizzaOrderID - The unique ID of the pizza order.
      cookingStrategy - The cooking strategy used to cook the pizza.
      cookingPrice - The price for cooking the pizza.

    • AbstractPizza

      public AbstractPizza(AbstractPizza otherPizza)
      Copy constructor for AbstractPizza. Creates a new pizza order with the same attributes as another pizza order.
      Parameters:
      otherPizza - The pizza order to copy attributes from.
